name: BANDIT CAPTAIN

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The bandit makes two attacks, using Scimitar and Pistol in any combination.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 30/90 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.text: Trigger: The bandit is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The bandit adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.
